doc.title: Dolly Parton: The Acoustic Collection, 1999-2002
doc.plot: This is for the fourth disc in the "Dolly Parton: The Acoustic Collection, 1999-2002" CD/DVD box set. The bonus DVD materials include Five new song mixes ("Seven Bridges Road," "Travelin' Prayer," "Train, Train," "Shine" and "I'm Gone"), two performances from the Dolly Parton Tribute Just Because I'm A Woman ("Little Sparrow" by Kasey Chambers and "Dagger Through The Heart" by Sinead O' Conner), three Dolly Parton videos ("Shine," "I'm Gone" and "Dagger Through The Heart") and one performance video of Dolly Parton and Norah Jones (singing "The Grass Is Blue" on the Country Music Association Awards Show).
